text: Night pressed down, the firelight stretching shadows long across the walls.
I had promised myself I wouldn’t go out again—but the quieter it got, the more it felt like something was closing in. I couldn’t sit still.
Lucia burst in, her voice shaking. "Innkeeper! The mentor—she’s gone!"
"Where did she go?"
"She suddenly put on her cloak and left… she only said ‘don’t follow.’ I also heard her mention the Echo Assembly."
I didn’t ask anything else. Those three words were enough to make me grip my short sword.
"Let’s go. If she won’t let you follow, then you follow me."
Fog and snow kneaded the streets into a blur as we chased toward the northern district.
The closer we got to Scrap Iron Alley, the quieter it became—unnaturally quiet.
The sounds that should have been there never came, like someone had already written the ending.
From the shadows at the mouth of the alley, Alicia stepped out. The edge of her cloak was scorched black, blood staining her gloves.
"…This is a pain."
"Mentor! Are you hurt?!"
"You went in alone?"
"Yeah."
"Don’t stand here."
She opened her palm—inside lay a ring-shaped sigil. She closed her hand quickly, like she didn’t want to look at it for too long.
She pushed open the rusted door. We followed her down.
The sigil patterns hadn’t fully faded yet. Black-robed bodies lay scattered across the floor. No chanting. No struggle—like a paragraph cut cleanly with a blade.
"You killed them…"
"I handled it."
"Why didn’t you bring us?"
She glanced at me, her tone flat. "Because you’d get in the way. And I already know how to deal with them—there was no need to worry."
Lucia bit her lip, then quietly pulled Alicia’s cloak tighter, shielding her from the cold.
"Your hands are shaking… you’re pushing yourself again."
Alicia didn’t deny it. She only tucked the sigil back into her clothes.
"We’re going back."
"Leave this place. I’ll still need it tomorrow."

options.text: Option A: Press her—“What is this place? Why are you so familiar with it?” 【Insight Check (INS DC 13)】
Option B: Stop questioning and escort them back to the inn 【No Check (DC 0)】
Option C: Make an excuse to stay behind and observe the area 【Perception Check (PER DC 12)】
